title: Tomato And Bean Salad With Grilled Tuna
summary: Tomato And Bean Salad With Grilled Tunan is a gluten free, dairy free, and pescatarian side dish. This recipe serves 15. One portion of this dish contains roughly 17g of protein, 4g of fat, and a total of 140 calories. For $2.44 per serving, this recipe covers 17% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 18 people have tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 8 minutes. Head to the store and pick up beans, heirloom tomatoes, tarragon leaves, and a few other things to make it today. It is perfect for The Fourth Of July. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 99%. This score is awesome. Try Grilled Tunan Over Green Bean, Tomato, and Chickpea Salad, White Bean, Tunan and Tomato Salad, and Tuna, Tomato, Bean and Basil Salad for similar recipes.
